feed.title: Combined summary - Lightning network implementation with ethereum

entry.title: Combined summary - Lightning network implementation with ethereum
entry.summary: Mahesh asked for an implementation that could be used with Ethereum, to which Christian responded that there is no working implementation for Ethereum. Although the Raiden network has attempted to port a Lightning-like network to Ethereum, it is uncertain what the current status of that project is. Due to differences in the underlying blockchain, a direct port is probably not possible, but a Lightning-like network can still be implemented.
